content: In this year of the Jubilee all land, and village houses, and the houses of the Levites were to revert to their original owners.
translations: ita:In quest'anno del Giubileo tutte le terre, le case dei villaggi e le case dei Leviti sarebbero tornate ai loro proprieta
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by ddnktr (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
